messages.title: WHAT THE NHS LONG-TERM PLAN MEANS FOR YOU AND YOUR FAMILY...
messages.content: Boris Johnson announces £1.8 billion cash boost for the NHS. ...these plans demonstrate a clear commitment to mental health through increased spending and introducing access standards.

messages.title: HELP US MAKE OUR NHS EVEN BETTER
messages.content: We're investing more money in the NHS. So why not help decide how it's spent locally? The NHS is part of our heritage. It's a statement of who we are as a country. We believe that everyone has the right to great healthcare that's free at the point of use - no matter where they live or what their background.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focus on prevention could save 500,000 lives. Primary Care to receive £4.5bn investment under NHS long-term plan.

To make 'NHS best place in the world to give birth'. Billions of pounds extra for our NHS. More doctors, nurses and health professionals. New treatments to fight diseases like cancer. More money for mental health services. New technology and better prevention. Tackling waste to spend every pound wisely.

issues.brexitEurope: By getting on with Brexit, we can keep focusing on the priorities we all share.
issues.economy: The NHS is part of our heritage.
issues.education: Brexit done right to help fund priorities like investing more – including in the funding for schools.
issues.health: We're investing billions extra in the NHS. Help decide how the money is spent locally. Primary Care to receive £4.5bn investment under NHS long-term plan. Major overhaul of birthing services to make 'NHS best place in the world to give birth'. More money for mental health services.

politicalExperience.role: Local MP candidate for Newcastle under Lyme

endorsements.endorsement: Boris Johnson announces £1.8 billion cash boost for the NHS.
NHS Long-term plan: Focus on prevention 'could save 500,000 lives'
...these plans demonstrate a clear commitment to mental health through increased spending and introducing access standards.
#TheNHSLongTermPlan is a welcome and significant step in the fight against heart and circulatory diseases, which promises to save thousands of lives in the coming years.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Fill in this survey and let us know your priorities for healthcare in Newcastle under Lyme.
